arts.sum: In added time Tierney fired in from 25 yards with McLean scoring from the halfway line.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Scotland qualify for World Cup and end 28-year wait in dramatic Denmark win
arts.sum: Scotland faced Denmark in World Cup qualifying knowing a win would secure qualifcation and anything less would mean needing to qualify for the tournament in the United States via a play-off

arts.ttl: Premier League star in tears as he's taken off on a stretcher in Scotland's crucial World Cup qualifier against Denmark
arts.sum: The winger had started the game for Steve Clarke's side at Hampden Park, with the players knowing that a win would secure their place at the 2026 World Cup in North America.

arts.ttl: Stunning McTominay overhead kick gives Scotland lead over Denmark

arts.ttl: Scotland v Denmark – Hampden gets set for a World Cup showdown
arts.sum: Steve Clarke has named his Scotland side to take on Denmark in the final match of the Group C qualification group at Hampden Park where both sides have their eyes firmly set on an automatic qualification place for next summer’s World Cup Finals across Canada, United States and Mexico. For Scotland the task is simple. Read More

arts.ttl: Scotland v Denmark: World Cup 2026 qualifying – live
arts.sum: ⚽ Live updates from the decisive qualifier in Glasgow ⚽ Football Daily | Live scores | Get in touch by emailing Rob Wounding events in modern history mean Scotland can not be a football country that expects. It is, however, one on tenterhooks as the prospect of long‑awaited World Cup qualification looms so large. On paper, the task is simple: beat Denmark at Hampden Park and the Scots will take a place in next summer’s tournament. It is the significance of progress that matters far more than the fact the Danes are ranked 18 places higher in the world. Continue reading...
